records.name: Lux* South Ari Atoll Resort & Villas

descriptions.direction: Dhidhoofinolhu Island is home to LUX* South Ari Atoll. Dhidhoofinolhu Marina and Maafushivaru Island Jetty are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Ari Atoll and Dhigurah Beach. Snorkeling and parasailing offer great chances to get out on the surrounding water, or you can seek out an adventure with hiking/biking trails nearby.
descriptions.general: Guests at the 5-star LUX* South Ari Atoll Hotel can cycle along the pier, swim alongside whale sharks, unwind in their bungalow on stilts, dine at any of its 8 restaurants, and have a drink at one of its 5 bars.With spa, gym and outdoor pool, direct beach access and all kinds of water sports, there won't be the chance to get bored.The high-end rooms, surrounded by gin-clear waters and tropical greenery, come with stylish furnishings, flat-screen TV, sun loungers, coffee machine, and mini bar.

records.short_description: Chic resort with 193 rooms, spa and bike rent
